item.title: This command
item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
item.description:
@Projext wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("max") && playerRights >= 2) { int sknum = 0; while (sknum >=0 && >= 21) { sknum++; addSkillXP(14910000,snum); sendMessage("complete"); } }
You spelt “sknum” wrong when using it in the addSkillXP, lol

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("max") && playerRights >= 2) { int sknum = 0; while (sknum >=0 && >= 21) { sknum++; addSkillXP(13034431, sknum); sendMessage("Congratulations on cheating your way to being the best."); } }
And yes, that will make all your levels from 0-21 have 13034431, which is level 99.

Read full topic

item.title: This command
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

so i have this skill maxing command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("max") && playerRights >= 2)
         {
	int sknum = 0;
	while (sknum >=0 && >= 21) {
		sknum++;
		addSkillXP(14910000,snum); 
		sendMessage("complete"); 
        }
}

now would that add a number to each consecutive skill untill it gets to the 21st skill, or am I doing it wrong?
edit: used while statment

Read full topic
